name: XXDK
summary: xx network client library for iOS
description:
The xxdk xx network client is a library that interfaces with the cMix
system, enabling access to all xx network messaging features,
including end-to-end encryption and metadata protection.

It contains functions for receiving and approving requests for
creating secure end-to-end messaging channels, discovering users, and
receiving different types of messages.

Learn more at https://xx.network/
